Disco is an automatic aggregator for resale fashion that takes the work out of searching for pre-loved clothing & accessories. Shop your favorite brands, and we do the rest: The Extension instantly pops up with secondhand versions so you can buy the same clothes you want, but for less and more sustainably!

How it works:
1. Download the extension
2. Navigate to a product page 
3. Voila! Disco to the rescue with secondhand options üõç‚ú®
